casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 10, 2008

[Cite as 04/1012008 Case Announcements #2, 2008-0hio-1729.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0646. Cambridge Co., Ltd. v. Telsat, Inc.

Summit App. No. 23935, 2008-0hio-1056. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay and appellee’s motion to dismiss,

It is ordered by the court that the motions are denied.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents and would grant the motion for stay. O’Donnell, J., dissents and would grant the motion to dismiss.
